translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the triplets beginning with “root cause”

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.13. Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika🔽Nasārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nasārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Naanārammaṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  mahantaraduka kusalattika  na sa ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sa ārammaṇaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na sa ārammaṇam na akusalam dhammam paccayā sa ārammaṇaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na anārammaṇam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca anārammaṇaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The great triad, the triplets beginning with “wholesome”

original: Nocittaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Naakusale tīṇi. Naabyākate tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no cittam na kusalam dhammam paccayā cittaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi na akusale tīṇi na abyākate tīṇi
translated: With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an indeterminate mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an indeterminate mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome formation dissociated from a mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome formation dissociated from a mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an indeterminate formation dissociated from a mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome formation dissociated from a mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome formation dissociated from a mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an indeterminate formation dissociated from a mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome formation associated with a mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome formation associated with a mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an indeterminate formation associated with a mind element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome formation associated with a mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome formation associated with a mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an indeterminate formation associated with a mind-consciousness element arises … With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome formation that is a condition by way of a root cause arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome formation that is a condition by way of a root cause arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an indeterminate formation that is a condition by way of a root cause arises … With a non-root cause as condition, a wholesome formation that is a condition by way of a decisive support condition arises … With a non-root cause as condition, an unwholesome formation that is a condition by way of a decisive support condition arises … With

original: Nacetasikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na cetasikam na kusalam dhammam paccayā cetasikaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With mind-element as condition, a wholesome mind-element arises … (Abbreviated.)
With root-cause as condition, the three … With none as condition, the three.

original: Nacittasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sampayuttaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a wholesome mind-factor not associated with mind as condition, a wholesome mind-factor associated with mind arises … (Abbreviated.)
With root-cause as condition, the one … With none as condition, the one.

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭham na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sasaṭṭhaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a wholesome mind-factor not in association with mind as condition, a wholesome mind-factor in association with mind arises … (Abbreviated.)
With root-cause as condition, the one … With none as condition, the one.

original: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta samuṭṭhānam na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta samuṭṭhānaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a wholesome mind-formation not derived from mind as condition, a wholesome mind-formation derived from mind arises … (Abbreviated.)
With root-cause as condition, the three … With none as condition, the three.

original: Nacittasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sahabhum na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sahabhū kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a wholesome mind-formation not conascent with mind as condition, a wholesome mind-formation conascent with mind arises … (Abbreviated.)
With root-cause as condition, the three … With none as condition, the three.

original: Nacittānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na citta anuparivattim na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta anuparivattī kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With the unwholesome as condition, the wholesome … the functional … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional.🔽With the functional as condition, the wholesome … the unwholesome … the wholesome and the unwholesome … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the unwholesome and the functional.

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With the unwholesome and the functional as condition, the wholesome … the unwholesome … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the unwholesome and the functional.🔽With the wholesome and the functional as condition, the unwholesome … the wholesome … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional.

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta  hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With the unwholesome and the wholesome as condition, the functional … the unwholesome … the wholesome … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional.🔽With the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional as condition, the functional … the unwholesome … the wholesome … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional.🔽With the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional as condition, the unwholesome … the wholesome … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional.🔽With the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional as condition, the wholesome … the unwholesome … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the unwholesome and the functional.🔽With the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional as condition, the functional … the unwholesome … the wholesome … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional.

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim na kusalam dhammam paccayā citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional as condition, the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome … the wholesome … the unwholesome and the functional … the wholesome and the functional … the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional.🔽With the unwholesome and the wholesome and the functional

original: Naajjhattikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nanoupādā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na ajjhattikam na kusalam dhammam paccayā ajjhattikaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na no upādā na kusalam dhammam paccayā no upādā kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  ekam pe avigate eka
